statements.statement: SELECT TOATHUOC_ID FROM TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC TT WHERE TT.KHAMBENH_ID ='$KHAMBENH_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND ( PHIEULINH_ID IS NOT NULL OR CHUNGTU_ID IS NOT NULL)
select * from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC order by TOATHUOC_ID
update TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC set TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'

select * from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC
TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'
SOTHUTUTOA = '$SOTHUTUTOA$'
KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
SOLUONG = '$SOLUONG$'
SONGAY = '$SONGAY$'
SOLANTRENNGAY = '$SOLANTRENNGAY$'
SOLUONGTRENLAN = '$SOLUONGTRENLAN$'
SOLUONG_BUOISANG = '$SOLUONG_BUOISANG$'
SOLUONG_BUOITRUA = '$SOLUONG_BUOITRUA$'
SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU = '$SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU$'
SOLUONG_BUOITOI = '$SOLUONG_BUOITOI$'
DUONGDUNG_ID = '$DUONGDUNG_ID$'
GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
NGUONDUOC_ID = '$NGUONDUOC_ID$'
PHIEULINH_ID = '$PHIEULINH_ID$'
CHUNGTU_ID = '$CHUNGTU_ID$'
NGUONLAYTHUOC = '$NGUONLAYTHUOC$'
COSO = '$COSO$'
KHOPHAT_ID = '$KHOPHAT_ID$'
PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY = '$PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY$'
MUANGOAI = '$MUANGOAI$'
TINHTIEN = '$TINHTIEN$'
MIENPHI = '$MIENPHI$'
BHYTDONGTIEN = '$BHYTDONGTIEN$'
KHONGTHUTIEN = '$KHONGTHUTIEN$'
TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
HUYTOATHUOC = '$HUYTOATHUOC$'
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
order by TOATHUOC_ID
select * from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID = '$value$' order by TOATHUOC_ID
select * from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$' order by TOATHUOC_ID
statements.update:
update TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC set KHAMBENH_ID = #KHAMBENH_ID# , TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID# , DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# , SOLUONG = #SOLUONG# , SONGAY = #SONGAY# , SOLANTRENNGAY = #SOLANTRENNGAY# , SOLUONGTRENLAN = #SOLUONGTRENLAN# , SOLUONG_BUOISANG = #SOLUONG_BUOISANG# , SOLUONG_BUOITRUA = #SOLUONG_BUOITRUA# , SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU = #SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU# , SOLUONG_BUOITOI = #SOLUONG_BUOITOI# , DUONGDUNG_ID = #DUONGDUNG_ID# , GHICHU = #GHICHU# , NGUONDUOC_ID = #NGUONDUOC_ID# , PHIEULINH_ID = #PHIEULINH_ID# , CHUNGTU_ID = #CHUNGTU_ID# , PHONGBANRATOA_ID = #PHONGBANRATOA_ID# , NGUONLAYTHUOC = #NGUONLAYTHUOC# , COSO = #COSO# , KHOPHAT_ID = #KHOPHAT_ID# , PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY = #PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY# , MUANGOAI = #MUANGOAI# , TINHTIEN = #TINHTIEN# , MIENPHI = #MIENPHI# , BHYTDONGTIEN = #BHYTDONGTIEN# , KHONGTHUTIEN = #KHONGTHUTIEN# , TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI# , HUYTOATHUOC = #HUYTOATHUOC# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#
PHAMVI_ID = #PHAMVI_ID#
where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'

SELECT tt.TOATHUOC_ID FROM TT_NOITRU_KHAMBENH KB join TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC TT on KB.KHAMBENH_ID = tt.KHAMBENH_ID WHERE KB.KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$' AND KB.ISTHUOCBV = '0' AND KB.RAVIEN = '1' AND TT.HUYTOATHUOC = '0' AND TT.TRANGTHAI = 'DADUYET'
Select * from TT_NOITRU_TRATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
delete from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
Select TOATHUOC_ID, DUOC_ID, KHOPHAT_ID, SOLUONG, KHAMBENH_ID, BENHVIEN_ID, NGUONDUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'

delete from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC
TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'
SOTHUTUTOA = '$SOTHUTUTOA$'
KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
SOLUONG = '$SOLUONG$'
SONGAY = '$SONGAY$'
SOLANTRENNGAY = '$SOLANTRENNGAY$'
SOLUONGTRENLAN = '$SOLUONGTRENLAN$'
SOLUONG_BUOISANG = '$SOLUONG_BUOISANG$'
SOLUONG_BUOITRUA = '$SOLUONG_BUOITRUA$'
SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU = '$SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU$'
SOLUONG_BUOITOI = '$SOLUONG_BUOITOI$'
DUONGDUNG_ID = '$DUONGDUNG_ID$'
GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
NGUONDUOC_ID = '$NGUONDUOC_ID$'
PHIEULINH_ID = '$PHIEULINH_ID$'
CHUNGTU_ID = '$CHUNGTU_ID$'
NGUONLAYTHUOC = '$NGUONLAYTHUOC$'
COSO = '$COSO$'
KHOPHAT_ID = '$KHOPHAT_ID$'
PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY = '$PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY$'
MUANGOAI = '$MUANGOAI$'
TINHTIEN = '$TINHTIEN$'
MIENPHI = '$MIENPHI$'
BHYTDONGTIEN = '$BHYTDONGTIEN$'
KHONGTHUTIEN = '$KHONGTHUTIEN$'
TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
HUYTOATHUOC = '$HUYTOATHUOC$'
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'

select * from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$' and REF_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$' and REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
PHAMVI_ID = #PHAMVI_ID#

select A.TONKHO, isnull(B.BOOK_NGOAI,0) BOOK_NGOAI, isnull(D.BOOK_NOI,0) BOOK_NOI, isnull(C.BOOK_NOI_THUOC,0) BOOK_NOI_THUOC, (A.TONKHO - isnull(B.BOOK_NGOAI,0) - isnull(D.BOOK_NOI,0)) TONKHO_BOOK from( select SUM(tk.SOLUONG) TONKHO, tk.DUOC_ID, sd.PHAMVI_ID, tk.NGUONDUOC_ID from TT_DUOC_TONKHO tk inner join TM_DUOC_PHAMVISD_MAPPING sd on sd.KHODUOC_ID = tk.KHODUOC_ID where sd.PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$' and tk.DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and tk.NGUONDUOC_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$' group by tk.DUOC_ID, sd.PHAMVI_ID, tk.NGUONDUOC_ID) A left join ( select SUM(SOLUONG) BOOK_NGOAI,DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NGOAITRU where PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$' and DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$' and TRANGTHAI = 'HIEULUC' and SOLUONG > 0 group by DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID) B on A.DUOC_ID = B.DUOC_ID and A.PHAMVI_ID = B.PHAMVI_ID and A.NGUONDUOC_ID = B.NGUONHANG_ID left join ( select SUM(SOLUONG) BOOK_NOI_THUOC,DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$' and DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$' and REF_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$' and REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$' and TRANGTHAI = 'HIEULUC' and SOLUONG > 0 group by DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID) C on A.DUOC_ID = C.DUOC_ID and A.PHAMVI_ID = C.PHAMVI_ID and A.NGUONDUOC_ID = C.NGUONHANG_ID left join ( select SUM(SOLUONG) BOOK_NOI,DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$' and DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$' and TRANGTHAI = 'HIEULUC' and SOLUONG > 0 group by DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID) D on A.DUOC_ID = D.DUOC_ID and A.PHAMVI_ID = D.PHAMVI_ID and A.NGUONDUOC_ID = D.NGUONHANG_ID

select A.TONKHO, isnull(B.BOOK_NGOAI,0) BOOK_NGOAI, isnull(D.BOOK_NOI,0) BOOK_NOI, (A.TONKHO - isnull(B.BOOK_NGOAI,0) - isnull(D.BOOK_NOI,0)) TONKHO_BOOK from( select SUM(tk.SOLUONG) TONKHO, tk.DUOC_ID, sd.PHAMVI_ID, tk.NGUONDUOC_ID from TT_DUOC_TONKHO tk inner join TM_DUOC_PHAMVISD_MAPPING sd on sd.KHODUOC_ID = tk.KHODUOC_ID where sd.PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$' and tk.DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and tk.NGUONDUOC_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$' group by tk.DUOC_ID, sd.PHAMVI_ID, tk.NGUONDUOC_ID) A left join ( select SUM(SOLUONG) BOOK_NGOAI,DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NGOAITRU where PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$' and DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$' and TRANGTHAI = 'HIEULUC' and SOLUONG > 0 group by DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID) B on A.DUOC_ID = B.DUOC_ID and A.PHAMVI_ID = B.PHAMVI_ID and A.NGUONDUOC_ID = B.NGUONHANG_ID left join ( select SUM(SOLUONG) BOOK_NOI,DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$' and DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$' and TRANGTHAI = 'HIEULUC' and SOLUONG > 0 group by DUOC_ID, PHAMVI_ID, NGUONHANG_ID) D on A.DUOC_ID = D.DUOC_ID and A.PHAMVI_ID = D.PHAMVI_ID and A.NGUONDUOC_ID = D.NGUONHANG_ID
statements.update:
update TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU set SOLUONG = #SOLUONG#, DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID#, NGAYHIEULUC = #NGAYHIEULUC#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#
PHAMVI_ID = #PHAMVI_ID#
KHODUOC_ID = #KHODUOC_ID#
where BOOKING_ID = '$BOOKING_ID$'
statements.delete:
delete from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where REF_ID = #TOATHUOC_ID# and REF_TABLE = #REF_TABLE# and DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# and BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID#
PHAMVI_ID = #PHAMVI_ID#
statements.update:
update TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU set SOLUONG = #SOLUONG# where KHODUOC_ID = '$KHODUOC_ID$' and DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and NGAYHIEULUC = '$NGAYHIEULUC$'
PHAMVI_ID = #PHAMVI_ID#
statements.statement: select sum(SOLUONG) as SOLUONG from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$' and DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
select CHUNGTU_ID, PHIEULINH_ID, HUYTOATHUOC, NGUOITAO_ID from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'

select A.CHUNGTU_ID, A.PHIEULINH_ID, A.HUYTOATHUOC, A.NGUOITAO_ID, A.TOATHUOC_ID from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC A inner join TT_NOITRU_KHAMBENH B on B.KHAMBENH_ID = A.KHAMBENH_ID where B.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'

delete from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = #KHAMBENH_ID#
#LSTTOATHUOC_ID[]#

delete from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where REF_TABLE = #REF_TABLE#
#LSTTOATHUOC_ID[]#

select * from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where REF_TABLE = #REF_TABLE#
#LSTTOATHUOC_ID[]#

select distinct a.*, b.SOLUONG as SOLUONGTAMNGUNG, pl.MACHUNGTU as SOPHIEULINH, ct.MACHUNGTU as SOCHUNGTU ,vp.BHYT_DONGIA, vp.BHYT_THANHTIEN, vp.BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA, vp.BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA, vp.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU, vp.DONGIA_DOANHTHU, dc.TENDUOCDAYDU, dc.BHYT DUOC_BHYT, ld.LOAIVATTU_ID, dc.DONVITINH , d.TAMNGUNG from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC a left join TT_NOITRU_TRATHUOC_CHITIET b on a.TOATHUOC_ID = b.TOATHUOC_ID left join TT_DUOC_PHIEULINH pl on pl.CHUNGTU_ID = a.PHIEULINH_ID left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU ct on ct.CHUNGTU_ID = a.CHUNGTU_ID left join TM_DUOC dc on a.DUOC_ID = dc.DUOC_ID left join TM_LOAIDUOC ld on dc.LOAIDUOC_ID = ld.LOAIDUOC_ID inner join TM_DUOC d on d.DUOC_ID = a.DUOC_ID left join (select max(BHYT_DONGIA) BHYT_DONGIA, Max(BHYT_THANHTIEN) BHYT_THANHTIEN, max(BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA) BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA, max(BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA) BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA, max(THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU) THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU, max(DONGIA_DOANHTHU) DONGIA_DOANHTHU, KHAMBENH_ID, REF_ID, REF_TABLE, DUOC_ID from TT_VIENPHI where KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$' and REF_TABLE = 'TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC' group by KHAMBENH_ID, REF_ID, REF_TABLE, DUOC_ID) vp on vp.REF_ID = a.TOATHUOC_ID and vp.REF_TABLE = 'TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC' and vp.DUOC_ID = a.DUOC_ID where a.KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$' and a.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT 0 AS COL WHERE 0=1
select MACHUNGTU as SOPHIEULINH from TT_DUOC_PHIEULINH where CHUNGTU_ID = '$PHIEULINH_ID$'
select MACHUNGTU as SOCHUNGTU from TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU where CHUNGTU_ID = '$CHUNGTU_ID$'

select * from TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU where CHUNGTU_ID in (select CHUNGTU_ID from TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU_CHITIET where TOATHUOCNOITRU_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$')
and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT * FROM ( select TT.DUOC_ID, TT.SOLUONG, TT.NGAYTAO, TT.SONGAY from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC TT inner join TT_NOITRU_KHAMBENH KB ON KB.KHAMBENH_ID = TT.KHAMBENH_ID inner join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN BA ON BA.BENHAN_ID = KB.BENHAN_ID where BA.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' AND BA.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND ISYLENHVTYT = '0'
convert(date, TT.NGAYTAO) >= convert(date, '$TUNGAY$')
convert(date, TT.NGAYTAO) <= convert(date, '$DENNGAY$')
union
select A.DUOC_ID, A.SOLUONG, A.NGAYTAO, A.SONGAY from TT_NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC A inner join TT_NGOAITRU_KHAMBENH KB ON KB.KHAMBENH_ID = A.KHAMBENH_ID inner join TM_DUOC B on B.DUOC_ID = A.DUOC_ID left join TM_LOAIDUOC C on C.LOAIDUOC_ID = B.LOAIDUOC_ID WHERE KB.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' AND KB.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
convert(date, A.NGAYTAO) >= convert(date, '$TUNGAY$')
convert(date, A.NGAYTAO) <= convert(date, '$DENNGAY$')
) AS TEMP ORDER BY TEMP.NGAYTAO

select distinct dpv.* from TM_DUOC_PHAMVISD_MAPPING dmap left join TM_DUOC_PHAMVISUDUNG dpv on dpv.PHAMVI_ID = dmap.PHAMVI_ID where dmap.KHODUOC_ID in (select KHODUOC_ID from TM_PHONGBAN_KHODUOC where PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$')

select distinct dpv.*, dmap.KHODUOC_ID, kd.MAKHO, lk.DICTIONARY_CODE LOAIKHO from TM_DUOC_PHAMVISD_MAPPING dmap left join TM_DUOC_PHAMVISUDUNG dpv on dpv.PHAMVI_ID = dmap.PHAMVI_ID and dpv.TAMNGUNG != '1' left join TM_KHODUOC kd on kd.KHODUOC_ID = dmap.KHODUOC_ID left join (select DICTIONARY_CODE, DICTIONARY_ID from LST_DICTIONARY where DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE like 'LoaiKhoDuoc') lk on lk.DICTIONARY_ID = kd.LOAIKHO_ID where dmap.KHODUOC_ID in (select KHODUOC_ID from TM_PHONGBAN_KHODUOC where PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$') and dmap.KHODUOC_ID = '$KHODUOC_ID$' and dpv.MAPHAMVI is not null
select top 1 dmap.* from TM_DUOC_PHAMVISD_MAPPING dmap where dmap.PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$'

select pv.*, dmap.KHODUOC_ID, kd.MAKHO, lk.DICTIONARY_CODE LOAIKHO from TM_DUOC_PHAMVISUDUNG pv left join TM_DUOC_PHAMVISD_MAPPING dmap on dmap.PHAMVI_ID = pv.PHAMVI_ID left join TM_KHODUOC kd on kd.KHODUOC_ID = dmap.KHODUOC_ID left join (select DICTIONARY_CODE, DICTIONARY_ID from LST_DICTIONARY where DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE like 'LoaiKhoDuoc') lk on lk.DICTIONARY_ID = kd.LOAIKHO_ID where pv.MAPHAMVI in ($LST_PHAMVI$)

select dmap.*, pvm.KHODUOC_ID, kd.MAKHO, lk.DICTIONARY_CODE LOAIKHO from TM_PHAMVI_DOITUONG_CHUCNANG dtcn left join TM_DUOC_PHAMVISUDUNG dmap on dmap.PHAMVI_ID = dtcn.PHAMVI_ID left join TM_DUOC_PHAMVISD_MAPPING pvm on dmap.PHAMVI_ID = pvm.PHAMVI_ID left join TM_KHODUOC kd on kd.KHODUOC_ID = pvm.KHODUOC_ID left join (select DICTIONARY_CODE, DICTIONARY_ID from LST_DICTIONARY where DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE like 'LoaiKhoDuoc') lk on lk.DICTIONARY_ID = kd.LOAIKHO_ID where dtcn.DOITUONG_ID = '$DOITUONG_ID$' and dtcn.MAMANHINH = '$MAMANHINH$'
isnull(dtcn.MUANGOAI, '0') = '$MUANGOAI$'
isnull(dtcn.CAPTHUOC, '0') = '1'

select tt.CHUNGTU_ID, tt.PHIEULINH_ID, tt.TRANGTHAI, pl.DUYET as DUYETPHIEULINH, ct.CHUNGTU_ID as CHUNGTUXUATNOIBO_ID, ct.LOAICHUNGTU, tt.KHAMBENH_ID, tt.DUOC_ID, tt.SOLUONG from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC tt left join TT_DUOC_PHIEULINH pl on tt.PHIEULINH_ID = pl.CHUNGTU_ID left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU ct on pl.CHUNGTU_ID = ct.PHIEULINH_ID where tt.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and (tt.PHIEULINH_ID is not null or tt.CHUNGTU_ID is not null or (tt.TRANGTHAI = 'DADUYET')) order by tt.CHUNGTU_ID DESC

select A.KHAMBENH_ID, B.TOATHUOC_ID, B.DUOC_ID, SUM(B.SOLUONG) SOLUONG from TT_NOITRU_TRATHUOC A left join TT_NOITRU_TRATHUOC_CHITIET B on A.TRATHUOC_ID = B.TRATHUOC_ID where A.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$' group by A.KHAMBENH_ID, B.TOATHUOC_ID, B.DUOC_ID
select * FROM TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID in ($LST_TOATHUOC_ID$)
select DUOC_ID FROM TM_DUOC where TAMNGUNG = '1'

DELETE FROM TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where REF_TABLE = 'TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC' and REF_ID in ($LST_TOATHUOC_ID$)
DELETE FROM TT_VIENPHI where REF_TABLE = 'TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC' and REF_ID in ($LST_TOATHUOC_ID$)
DELETE FROM TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID in ($LST_TOATHUOC_ID$)
select * FROM TT_BACSI_GHICHU where BACSI_ID = $BACSI_ID$ and LOAIGHICHU = '$LOAIGHICHU$'
INSERT INTO TT_BACSI_GHICHU (BACSI_ID ,GHICHU ,LOAIGHICHU ,NGAYTAO ,BENHVIEN_ID) VALUES (#BACSI_ID# ,#GHICHU# ,#LOAIGHICHU# ,Getdate() ,#BENHVIEN_ID#)

select B.*, C.KHODUOC_ID from TM_PHAMVI_DOITUONG_TOATHUOC B left join (select distinct PHAMVI_ID, KHODUOC_ID from TM_DUOC_PHAMVISD_MAPPING) C on C.PHAMVI_ID = B.PHAMVI_ID where B.TAMNGUNG != '1' and B.DOITUONG_ID = '$DOITUONG_ID$'
